table.name: civicrm_uf_group
table.comment: User framework groups. Each group represents a form which encompasses a set of fields defined in civicrm_uf_fields table. Initially will be used for CiviCRM Profile form(s). Subsequently we anticipate using this to define other public facing forms (e.g. online donation solicitation forms, mailing list preferences, etc.).

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this form currently active? If false, hide all related fields for all sharing contexts.

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in form.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in form.

field.name: weight
field.comment: Controls display order when multiple user framework groups are setup for concurrent display.

field.name: limit_listings_group_id
field.comment: Group id, foriegn key from civicrm_group

field.name: cancel_URL
field.comment: Redirect to URL when Cancle button clik .
